content:

### Adverse Events

- AE ID: RB-AE-2159, Description: hyperkalemia, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Cohort: 50mg

### Protocol Deviations
- No protocol deviations reported.

### Events
- Renal ultrasound images uploaded to central imaging core.
- Protocol training refresher completed for site coordinators.

### Notes
- Week 21: Renal biomarker collection on schedule. 86 subjects enrolled across 4 cohorts. eGFR and urinary biomarkers within expected variability.
